content.rendered:
Stefan Salvatore (Paul Wesley) is a vampire. However, no one guesses this at Mystic Falls High School, where he returns unexpectedly. At school, she falls in love with the beautiful Elena (Nina Dobrev), who has been unable to find herself since the death of her parents. However, their love is overshadowed by dark tics. Although Stefan lives a peaceful life, his brother Damon (Ian Somerhalder) poses a deadly threat to the city’s residents, including Elena. Only Stefan can stop the bloodthirsty Damon. However, in order to compete with his strength and power, Stefan also needs human blood.”

Number of Seasons: 8 (2009-2017)

Status: Finished

Creators: Kevin Williamson, Julie Plec

Channel: The CW

Starring: Nina Dobrev, Paul Wesley, Ian Somerhalder
